sentences.sentence: The rate at which hair grows can be agonizingly slow.
sentences.translation: 头发生长的速度可以慢得令人苦恼。

sentences.sentence: They were, at least, agonizingly aware of the easy money in the vicinity.
sentences.translation: 他们最起码都揪心地意识到，近在眼前就有唾手可得的钱。

sentences.sentence: The tortoise crept along at an agonizingly slow speed.
sentences.translation: 那只乌龟以让人难受的慢速度爬行着。
